apps.title: VCBot
apps.description: Someone once said "VCs would be the last job AI could replace".Turns out even roasting founders doesn't require human effort.

apps.title: V-Combinator
apps.description: A launchpad for indie creators using generative AI to build fun, expressive products. Each week, creators submit their apps, prototypes, or experiments — and the community votes. We announce batch winners every week. Whether it’s polished or chaotic, just ship it.

apps.title: LayoffBot
apps.description: Generate corporate-style layoff messages with the perfect mix of corporate jargon and empty promises. For when you need to let someone down gently.

apps.title: BreakupBot
apps.description: The AI-powered breakup assistant that helps you craft the perfect breakup message. Because sometimes you need a little help being heartless.
